claim: Despicable Me 3 stars the voice of an actor.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film stars the voice of Steve Carell as Gru , a supervillain who adopts three girls  (  voiced by Miranda Cosgrove , Dana Gaier , and Elsie Fisher  )  from an orphanage ; and the voice of Jason Segel as Vector , a rival of Gru who steals the Great Pyramid of Giza .
